item.title: About
item.description: I believe in service leadership, in creating opportunities for myself and for others, and in embracing creative chances. Right now, I consult with Ernst & Young to drive technology transformation for clients through strategy, architecture and infrastructure. Before that, I had marvelous experiences managing ERP and CRM deployments at GE Healthcare and Telamon. I’ve worked across the life sciences, automotive and utilities industries (to name a few) and developed skills in project management, supply chain process improvement and user experience.

item.title: Illustration
item.description: For commissions or samples of my work, feel free to email me or message me on Twitter.
